person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CRICKET - AUSTRALIA BEAT WEST INDIES BY FIVE WICKETS .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| AUSTRALIA |
| WEST INDIES |

The paragraph mentions two cricket teams, Australia and West Indies. Even though teams are organizations, in the context of cricket, they are often personified and referred to as "Australia" and "West Indies" instead of "Australian team" or "West Indies team". Therefore, I have identified these two entities as "Person" entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| AUSTRALIA |
| WEST INDIES |

There are no other entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a "Person". Therefore, the table remains the same.
